title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Package Room, Near Stores
description:
The studio apartment home at 1211 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features wood floors. The large windows face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as April 13, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Sue's Produce Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., or the Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books, magazines, and journals at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, and Sephora. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at Ultimo or La Colombe. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Stroll across the park and then buy an artisanal loaf of bread at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. View an exhibition at the Franklin Institute. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with wifi
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 12th floor
* Large windows that face south
* Chancellor Street view
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)

x122 or Michelle at  show contact info
x129 to schedule an appointment or to reserve this apartment home. Please note that an appointment is required to tour. Live virtual tours on FaceTime and in Zoom available!

title: C.O.N.T.A.C.T-U.S & Rent this amazing 3/2.5 split- level home.
description: Don't miss the opportunity to make this beautiful 3 Bedroom 2 1/2 bathroom split- level in the Pine Valley section yours! Enter through the newer insulated front doors to the large foyer that has a storage closet and new tile flooring( 2020) . Just a few steps up is the main living area where you have a living room/ dining room combo that features seamless original hardwood flooring, bright and airy neutral paint colors, vaulted ceilings and a large bay window to let in lots of natural lighting. The wood railing and post were just put in 2011. The Kitchen has been updated just a few years ago which includes Kitchen Aid appliances, new granite countertop, undermount stainless steel sink & garbage disposal. There are also solid wood cabinets, tile backsplash, recessed lighting, and plenty of room to put a table for an eat in area. Up stairs are 3 great size bedrooms with ceiling fans, newer windows, neutral paint colors, & personal closet space. The master features its own private bathroom that was remodeled in 2019 with a glass stall shower, tile flooring, new toilet and vanity with storage. The main hallway bathroom has also been updated in 2009. Just a few steps down from the kitchen is your lower level family room. There is wall to wall carpeting, crown molding, a stone wall featuring a gas fireplace and newer sliding Anderson Doors to the private patio area. There is also a conveniently located powder room on this level. The enclosed patio space is perfect for year round use. The ceiling to floor doors and windows let in tons of natural light and provide plenty of space to make this your new hang out. Just outside the patio is your oasis of a back yard. There is a pressure treated wood deck right off of the kitchen that provides the perfect area to entertain or simply just relax after a long day. There is also a 8'x8'x8' storage shed located in the back corner. Lastly the finished basement can be used for additional living space, entertaining or storage. This home has been meticulously maintained and updated throughout the years and the pride of ownership speaks for itself. Other notable features include: New sump pump with new check valve installed 2019, new insulated windows throughout, New Central AC system installed 2012, Roof installed 2013. Schedule your appointment today or stop by our Open House to check out this amazing home!

The first floor has an open floor plan with Oak wood floors in the living and dining areas which lead into the kitchen with island seating, granite countertops and Samsung stainless appliances including a French door refrigerator. Behind the kitchen is a mudroom with full size laundry machines, separate powder room and the back door leading to the large, fenced in yard. Second floor has a master bedroom lots of light and a full bathroom and there are 2 other nice sized bedrooms with a full bath in hallway. The bedrooms are all carpeted and have ceiling fans. The house has central air conditioning, is wired for a security alarm system, has a new roof and has a full, dry basement which is great for storage. A partial tax abatement is also in place until 2026.This house is a 2-block walk to Main Street where you can find a wide variety of restaurants, shops and bars.

Two bedroom plus den, two bathroom with gray wood-like floors, an efficient layout and tasteful updates throughout. Enter The Carlyle, Unit 101 through a gallery foyer with ample space for displaying artwork. A set of french doors leads to the light-filled living room providing great entertaining space. The updated kitchen features wood cabinetry, tile flooring and stainless steel appliances. Just off of the kitchen, there is a separate dining room that could also be utilized as a den (or third bedroom). Both bedrooms enjoy great closet space, oversized windows and their own ensuite bathrooms. The Carlyle is a pet-friendly, doorman building only one block from Rittenhouse Square. Rent includes the security of a 24-hour doorman and use of the building's state-of-the-art gym.
Pets Allowed gym available

title: Beautifully renovated bi-level 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment
description:
Beautifully renovated bi-level 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square with PRIVATE BALCONY!! This unique vintage building has all of the historic charm of a converted brownstone paired with modern updates throughout making for stylish and comfortable living. Enjoy restored hardwood floors and a kitchen with brand new appliances including dishwasher, European-style cabinetry and marbled quartz countertops. The living room is sizable and can accommodate large furniture in addition to a terrace with nice eastern city exposure! Upstairs you'll find 2 large bedrooms with a bathroom - quiet and separate from the rest of the apartment. Central air in this unit as well as washer/dryer in unit. Very pet friendly with parking options nearby! Now offering 1/2 month free on a 15 month lease!!
